inventory.commentary: Does not include the common pronominal use of this term

sense.name: the quality of significance, consequence
sense.examples: That performance of La Traviata was really something! A thirty-foot whale shark is something to see. She is truly something.

sense.name: an indeterminate amount, or degree, of a quality
sense.examples: The lecture was something of a bore. She is actually something of a philanthropist. The party turned into something of a row.

sense.name: the quality of specialness or impressiveness
sense.examples: That new chef at Le Bistro is something else! Mary's wedding gown was something else. John said his ride in the MIG was something else.
